name: Puzzle & Blocks
description:
BEAUTIFUL:
Stylish, bright and attractive. Stay varied as the difficulty increase.

RELAXING:
True minimalistic nature: no timers, menus, or other obnoxious labels that may impact the immersion.
It is contemplative and doesn’t need the added pressure of a timer or energy system to keep you playing, you’ll go back and play more because it is enjoyable.

EASY TO PLAY:
Pay attention to the shapes and target zones in each puzzle and push the blocks into the star zones. Match all the places to solve the puzzle.

Features:
-Minimalistic puzzle games
Gorgeous, engaging and easy to play.
-Pure gameplay experience
No times restrictions, no energy system, only requires creative puzzle-solving.
-Soft soundtracks to listen to
-90 Challenging levels, and more coming...
